abstract: ABC’s celebrity dancers were no match for Fox’s would-be celebrities in Tuesday’s ratings. According to Nielsen’s estimates, Fox’s “American Idol” outpaced ABC’s “Dancing With the Stars” by more than 10 million viewers during the 9 p.m. hour, when the two series went head-to-head.
lead_paragraph: ABC’s celebrity dancers were no match for Fox’s would-be celebrities in Tuesday’s ratings. According to Nielsen’s estimates, Fox’s “American Idol” outpaced ABC’s “Dancing With the Stars” by more than 10 million viewers during the 9 p.m. hour, when the two series went head-to-head.
